name: Neat Wheat
description:
Play as Neat Wheat, a young strand of wheat that feels powerless against the world, but decides to take on the local food competition in order to improve.

This is the bullet-hell kind of game, but you'll be fine.

Didn't quite have time to finish the music, so just listen to whatever you want.

My submission to the NoobyJam, as well as my first 'complete' Godot game.

Thanks for reading, and enjoy!
